definition[0]: useful to you because it saves you time, or does not spoil your plans or cause you problems
example[0]: Mail-order catalogs are a convenient way to shop.
example[1]: My secretary will call you to arrange a convenient time to meet.
example[2]: Is three o'clock convenient for you?
example[3]: It is simple and convenient to use.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually say a good time/day etc rather than a convenient time/day etc:
example[4]: Is this a good time for you to talk?
example[5]: The bus stop around the corner is probably the most convenient.
example[6]: restaurants convenient for shops and theatres
